txt.en:
[placeholder],

A matter has come to my attention, and I think that it will serve you to provide the solution. Seek me out at the Bree Jail, and I will explain more.

Daisy Appledore
'Welcome, I am pleased to see you. Let us discuss what it is that I intend for you.'
You received a letter from your trainer in Bree-town asking for you to return to her. Apparently, there is something that she wishes to teach you.
Bring the letter to Daisy Appledore in Bree
Daisy Appledore sent you a letter requesting that you visit her at Bree Jail.\n\nDeliver the letter to Daisy Appledore within the Bree Jail.
